People have the right to complain about this stuff, but on the other hand people have the right to make these types of doujins. If you don't like something u have the right to an opinion but it doesn't make it a right or wrong opinion all you can do is leave it be and try to ignore it. In my opinion if you really like a character to the point of not wanting to sully that character then why read doujins of them in the first place (unless they are canon, looking at you Princess Lover)

But you know what now I’m triggered by all of your comments. Quoting your previous replies “because some people care for these characters and don't wanna see them get raped/humilated” then don’t click on it. If you click on something then you’re gonna see more of it. That’s how this site works. We clear on that? Also once again I’m not attacking just you. If you don’t do those kind of stuff then that’s fine. I was just ranting about those annoying ass people who comments ntr bad on every ntr doujins ever. Doesn’t specifically have to be you ok? Tldr If you hate something then don’t do that thing and just leave that thing because some other people might like that thing. Also stop complaining when you die because you drink milk even though you’re fully aware of the fact that you’re lactose intolerant.

@Zero tsu
Like you have a nhentai account you fucking degenerate And an anime pfp. You think you can complain? Sure but I can complain about your complainings too. If you can’t live with that, then tou’re either work on yourself or avoid the interner as a whole for being an ignorant prick. “Theres no ub tag” bro are you blind did you even see the cover??.  The cover says it all. It’s a ub doujin with prostitution type of stuff. You know you will hate it and yet you still clicked on it. You chose this path yourself knowing what lies ahead and then you think you have the right to complain? Dis like buying and drinking a carton milk knowing you’re lactose intolerant and then complaining you died because of it.  “Not every ub doujins is a rape work” yeah but does the cover looks like it’s one of them? Also who said you can’t dislike it? Of course you can. I have kinks that I heavily dislike too. But when I see 10 other comments saying they hate it I just keep my opinion to myself.

@Zero Tsu
I thought I was joking when I said you people can’t read. I said I made an account because of your type of people just to say fuck you. It doesn’t necessarily have to be you. It could be any other person with your type of personality that I’ve met last year. The world doesn’t revolve around you. Not everything is about you. Also good job replying to my replys because I’m also happy you’re triggered enough to reply to it. Also no you don’t have the right to complain. If you want to complain about stupid shit you go to Twitter not here you whiny little bitch. Complain all you want there idgaf but you doing it here really irritates me for some reason. Probably because I’ve seen millions of the exact same comment on every slightly unwholesome doujins. Again I’m not talking about just you, I’m talking about your type of people. Also the “mMhmM tHis nEeDs mOrE nTr” on wholesome doujins. Yeah fuck those people too. Don’t kinkshame people you’re not above them.
